title: New Website
content: First blog post on the new site. I'm leaving squarespace behind because it was too much of a hassle.

With this new site I can create my own systems for updating the blog, so while this entry is typed manually in markdown language, future entries may be assembled automatically.

I will also probably make some retroactive posts, filling in what I've been doing as well as porting over posts from my old squarespace site and my new tumblr.
